be.Balor.Tools.Debug
Class LogFormatter

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Formatter
      be.Balor.Tools.Debug.LogFormatter

public class LogFormatter
extends java.util.logging.Formatter

A Formatter that may be customised in a logging.properties file. The syntax of the property com.thinktankmaths.logging.TerseFormatter.format specifies the output. A newline will be appended to the string and the following special characters will be expanded (case sensitive):-

  • %m - message
  • %L - log level
  • %n - name of the logger
  • %t - a timestamp (in ISO-8601 "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss Z" format)
  • %M - source method name (if available, otherwise "?")
  • %c - source class name (if available, otherwise "?")
  • %C - source simple class name (if available, otherwise "?")
  • %T - thread ID
  • %S - StackTrace if exeption thrown
The default format is . Curly brace characters are not allowed.

Author:
Samuel Halliday
